person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organisation ( PLO ) negotiators said the last two weeks of talks with Israel on implementing the long-delayed handover of most of Hebron to PLO rule had been " meaningless " , necessitating an Arafat-Netanyahu meeting .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Person" entities:

1. Yasser Arafat - A Palestinian politician and leader of the PLO.
2. Benjamin Netanyahu - An Israeli politician and Prime Minister of Israel.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to "Person" in the given paragraph:

1. Yasser Arafat
2. Benjamin Netanyahu

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Person" in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Person |
| --- |
| Yasser Arafat |
| Benjamin Netanyahu |

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organisation ( PLO ) negotiators said the last two weeks of talks with Israel on implementing the long-delayed handover of most of Hebron to PLO rule had been " meaningless " , necessitating an Arafat-Netanyahu meeting .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Organization" entities:

1. Palestine Liberation Organisation (PLO) - a political and military organization that represents the Palestinian people and is committed to achieving their independence and self-determination.
2. Israel - a country in the Middle East that is the focus of the negotiations between the PLO and the Israeli government.
3. Arafat-Netanyahu - a reference to the leaders of the two organizations, Yasser Arafat and Benjamin Netanyahu, who are involved in the negotiations.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to "Organization" in the given paragraph:

1. Palestine Liberation Organisation (PLO) - a political and military organization that represents the Palestinian people and is committed to achieving their independence and self-determination.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Organization":

| Organization |
| --- |
| Palestine Liberation Organisation (PLO) |
